textBeforeTable: For proposal development assistance, please contact the Research Development Office. The amount represents the "upper amount" listed for this opportunity. The "initial deadline" corresponds to day proposals are due at the Office of Grants and Contracts Administration (OGCA). OGCA deadlines are uniformly five (5) days before the official agency deadline.  Remember to notify OGCA of your intent to submit. This list includes all funding opportunities for instrumentation identified from Community of Science (COS).  All opportunities listed here are appropriate for academic institutions in the United States. textAfterTable: © 2010-2013 University of Massachusetts Amherst | Site Policies | Report A Problem This page is maintained by Research and Engagement.   The mission of the Office of Research and Engagement is to provide leadership and services that support the growth of research and scholarship across the campus, to facilitate funding and engagement with external partners, to promote innovation and societal impact, and to ensure compliance with all research related regulations and policies.
